scripts.dev: bun run prepare-website && (trap 'kill 0' EXIT; bun run scripts/sync-website.ts --watch --skip-initial-sync & cd .build-cache/mirascope-website && bun run start)
scripts.build: bun run prepare-website && (cd .build-cache/mirascope-website && bun run build) && cp -r .build-cache/mirascope-website/dist dist
